title: Angry commuters drag XR protesters off Tube as they try to glue themselves on
text:
Share this article via flipboard

Share this article via email

Share this article via messenger

The protesters were ambushed by commuters in Canning Town (Picture: Extinction Rebellion)

Furious London commuters have been filmed dragging Extinction Rebellion protesters off the top of a train at Canning Town station.

Activists are targeting four Tube lines today as part of their ongoing demonstration in the capital.

It is believed they have picked the lines based on their connection to London’s financial district.

Shocking moment angry commuters drag two #ExtinctionRebellion protestors off the top of a train in Canning Town and attack them. pic.twitter.com/EZAMa9tT2t — Mahatir Pasha (@mahatir_pasha) October 17, 2019

This is a breaking news story, more to follow soon…
description: Furious London commuters have been pulling Extinction Rebellion protesters off the top of an train in at Canning Town station.
